notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: A.P., G.A., M. Byk, and L.G. conducted the high-pressure single-crystal X-ray diffraction experiments. A.P. analyzed the X-ray diffraction data. M. Bel. and I.A. conducted ab initio calculations. A.P., L.D., M. Bel, I.A. and S.K. interpreted the results and wrote the paper with the contribution of all authors.
